headline: Constellation Brands (NYSE:STZ) Removed From Russell Top 200 Indices
summary: Constellation Brands (NYSE:STZ) experienced notable index reclassifications last week, including its removal from the Russell Top 200 and addition to the Russell Midcap Index. Although the company saw a flat price movement, these index changes might have added some weight to the broader market dynamics. While major indices like the S&P 500 and Nasdaq Composite achieved new highs amid a positive market sentiment driven by optimistic trade talks and economic outlooks, Constellation Brands'...
